#summary javaScriptIncludeTag(sources[type])
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ViewHelperFunctions View Helper Functions]

*Description*

Returns a `script` tag based on the supplied arguments.

*Return Type*:

String

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *sources* || string || true ||   || The name of a JavaScript file in the `javascripts` folder ||
|| *type* || string || false || text/javascript || The `type` attribute for the `script` tag ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- view code --->
<head>
  #javaScriptIncludeTag("main")#
</head>
}}}
